Are you taking full advantage of Streamer DATEKelite Datek Elite tollfree number ELITE From outside the US Datek Elite fax Datek Elite email New Build and Save Customized Streamer Desktops Dear Larry Campbell Now Streamer realtime quotes can be as individual as you are each and every time you log on to trade Our new Quick Launch feature lets you load arrange and save your favorite Streamer screens onto your desktop Customize these screens to fit your trading preferences Save what you like and youll save valuable time by returning to your favorite screen every time you open Streamer In addition weve developed Streamer Actives This applet lists the most active stocks within parameters you choose Choose your criteria time interval and market The Island ECN or activity among Datek customers and Streamer Actives does the rest Datek Elite customers like you can take advantage of exclusive new Streamer capabilities Streamer News offers you realtime market information from some of the same sources that Wall Street professionals rely on And as a Datek Elite customer your stock lists will now accommodate twice as many stocks as before up to stocks each Looking to save screen space You can do so with smaller font sizes and resizable applets or use Streamer hotkeys back by popular demand You can access all these features on the Streamer Console As always if you have any questions regarding your account please contact Datek Elite Customer Support at or call us at ELITE from AM to PM ET every trading day Sincerely John J Mullin President Datek Online Financial Services LLC wwwdatekcom PS We appreciate your commitment to Datek and we hope that we are continuing to fulfill our pledge to provide the highest level of service available from an online broker Your suggestions and comments are always welcome at The trial offer of Streamer News will be available to nonprofessional users only until end of day December Streamer is a registered trademark of Datek Online Holdings Corp You were emailed because you have become a member of Datek Elite by virtue of trading with Datek over the past three months on average at least times per month and maintaining at least in assets in your Datek account Datek reserves the right to alter the Elite program at any time including but not limited to membership criteria and services and benefits offered Any Elite customer levied an inactivity fee will no longer receive Elite benefits On occasion Datek will email you about Elite promotions special service announcements or upgrades Please let us know if you would prefer
